title: The prescription problem: Drug giants challenge state over “forever chemical” disclosure
description: A major pharmaceutical industry coalition is asking the U.S. Department of Justice to override a Minnesota law requiring disclosure of PFAS “forever chemicals” in products, including some medications. Hundreds of widely prescribed drugs, including statins and…
